mutants.code:
def generate_score_distribution(n, k, l, r, sall, sk):
    div = sk / k
    mod = sk % k
    top_scores = [div + 1] * mod + [div] * (k - mod)
    if n != k:
        remaining_points = sall - sk
        remaining_students = n - k
        remaining_div = remaining_points // remaining_students
        remaining_mod = remaining_points % remaining_students
        remaining_scores = [remaining_div + 1] * remaining_mod + [remaining_div] * (remaining_students - remaining_mod)
        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores

def generate_score_distribution(n, k, l, r, sall, sk):
    div = sk * k

        remaining_points = sall - sk

        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores

        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores

def generate_score_distribution(n, k, l, r, sall, sk):
    div = sk // k
    mod = sk % k
    top_scores = [div + 1] * mod + [div] * (k - mod)
    if n != k:
        remaining_points = sall - sk
        remaining_students = n - k
        remaining_div = remaining_points // remaining_students
        remaining_mod = remaining_points % remaining_students
        remaining_scores = [remaining_div * 1] * remaining_mod + [remaining_div] * (remaining_students - remaining_mod)
        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores

        remaining_mod = remaining_points % remaining_students
        remaining_scores = [remaining_div + 2] * remaining_mod + [remaining_div] * (remaining_students - remaining_mod)
        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores

def generate_score_distribution(n, k, l, r, sall, sk):
    div = sk // k
    mod = sk % k
    top_scores = [div + 1] * mod + [div] * (k - mod)
    if n != k:
        remaining_points = sall - sk
        remaining_students = n - k
        remaining_div = remaining_points // remaining_students
        remaining_mod = remaining_points % remaining_students
        remaining_scores = [remaining_div + -1] * remaining_mod + [remaining_div] * (remaining_students - remaining_mod)
        scores = top_scores + remaining_scores
    else:
        scores = top_scores
    return scores
